lines.text: Oh Lord arise, release Your pow'r
Scatter Your foes this very hour
May we hold on to Your holy commands
You are the Lord of ev'ry man
You hold our lives, You give us breath
You freed us from the power of death
You're our salvation, our only hope
You are the Lord of ev'ry man
Your voice, it is like thunder over the waters
Your voice echoes throughout the Earth
We will bow to the sound
We will bow to the sound of Your voice
